    • appointmentValidation

      public static String appointmentValidation(int appointmentID, LocalDateTime start, LocalDateTime end, int customerID, String eMessage) throws SQLException
      Appointment validation Checks to make sure that the start and end times are not equal to each other Checks to make sure that the start time is not after the end time Checks to make sure the appointment does not overlap with another
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The appointment ID
      start - The start datetime
      end - The end datetime
      customerID - The customer ID
      eMessage - The error message
      Returns:
      The error message
      Throws:
      SQLException - The Exception
